About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Starting is the hard part

Hi! My name is Josh. I am a self-taught software developer. For the past year I started a journey of learning to become a Full-Stack Developer. Amongst my list of goals, I am currently building upon the coding skills I have gained by continuing to creating apps that can provide some assistance to all. I have been able to learn the essentials of HTML, CSS & Javascript. I am focusing on finishing my learning of NODEJS, Wordpress and React Native. I have started a project that is to help others with their fitness goals. I will be doing weekly updates on the application as I use all newly learned techniques with building the project.
